Solid @Perduesenate. Still the outsider. With the grit and experience Georgia deserves. https://t.co/bMFMDTGR3K

May God bless every person in this institution those serving now & those who serve in the years to come with the wisdom strength & compassion to advance this great and glorious cause we call the United States of America.   https://t.co/kc5jJm9xyA https://t.co/nUcrfv6sW2

Often the best policies are the product of broad perspectives and creativity with input from people who bring experience from different walks of life. Serving on the Select Committee on the Modernization of Congress is the perfect capstone to my career in public service.

I want to share the most essential lesson learned over the past decade: the importance of relationship building. Tone rhetoric and civility are crucial to opening doors to new and unexpected relationships with lawmakers from across the political spectrum.

Today I sent letters to Gov. Kemp & House officials to say I would be stepping down from Congress on Sunday 10/4. It is time to begin the next season in life. I will be forever grateful for the incredible privilege of serving my country & community as a member of Congress. https://t.co/bcdCPl8aRH
Our President @realDonaldTrump & First Lady @FLOTUS are fighters. Praying for their good health and a quick recovery.
Congrats @JohnsonWildcats! Thank you for your continued commitment to learning. You are shaping our future leaders. https://t.co/Ku88I9KfDF
Thanks @ASP for teaming up with me & @ModernizeCmte to highlight our bipartisan work. 🇺🇸👍🏻 https://t.co/FfHZKrnDse

The group forged ahead together even as an impeachment inquiry tore @ the fabric of the nation & stoked partisanship & a global pandemic challenged lawmakers & staff to reimagine legislative biz and constituent services in the digital space.   Proud of our work @ModernizeCmte. https://t.co/ZdTHRPuCuL

The last 18 months have been spent working with Chair Kilmer and our 10 committee members identifying ways to truly make The People’s House more efficient effective and transparent for the people we serve.    I can think of no better capstone to my career in Congress. 🇺🇸

This bipartisan approach - led by Chair @RepDerekKilmer - helped us find ways to work better together ways to better connect with our constituents & showed the American people that regardless of our political differences a commitment to those we serve should come first.

One of the things I value most about @ModernizeCmte is though we have different backgrounds our 12 members are united w/ a common goal to improve the way the legislative branch works for you.    Bipartisan relationships are critical to getting things done for the ppl we serve.

Today @ModernizeCmte passed 40 new recommendations to help make Congress work better for the American people.  This brings our total recommendations made in the last 20 months to 97!   https://t.co/f1R5IacTjy
Today @ModernizeCmte will vote to pass 40 new recommendations to make Congress work better.   Tune in @ the link below to watch our final meeting. https://t.co/Tshx8ZsJyL
Thx @GAChamber @cclark_georgia1! The @ModernizeCmte is a bright spot in Congress & I’m proud of our work with Chair @RepDerekKilmer to make the People’s House more effective. https://t.co/c1DhGl11QY

Making Congress work better for the American people...one superhero at a time. 🇺🇸  Thanks @ChrisEvans @ASP @MarkKassen for teaming up w/ me & @RepDerekKilmer. https://t.co/FmShEWXbkS https://t.co/odzvzXqGHG

Learning a traditional foreign language in school is a great skill. But computer coding should also be an option for students interested in digital fields. It's a skill that's deeply needed. The world is a better place because John Lewis spent his life pursuing freedom justice opportunity love and peace for all. I can think of no better statue in the U.S. Capitol representing #GA than one of John Lewis. #JohnLewisStatue @SanfordBishop   https://t.co/oHa1Jfyxd8

Proud to lead this effort with my friend @SanfordBishop. I can think of no better statue in the U.S. Capitol representing #GA than one of John Lewis. John’s legacy should be honored in our nation’s Capital for generations to come. #JohnLewisStatue https://t.co/tHIdCoY5Ya

Agree w @SangerNYT - we need a 21st century approach to global #cyber threats. This includes:   ✔️Active defense ✔️Secure networks & apps w/o foreign surveillance ✔️Global cyber standards so #US & NATO allies know when an Article 5 response is triggered  https://t.co/sT8lhBz7wh

The hackers "stole information not only for their personal profit but also research & tech that they knew would be of value to the Chinese govt." Our nation has lost a giant. We are so much better because of John Lewis. I was honored to lead a moment of silence in his honor w/ my friend @SanfordBishop. God Bless John Lewis.  https://t.co/rKYaWFduSD
John Lewis was a dear friend. I am lucky to have served alongside him. God bless him and his family in the days to come. https://t.co/3O4GS65KkO

We are at a cyber crossroads in our country. Especially w/ #US workforce operating remotely the need for secure networks apps and platforms has never been more impt.  Thanks @martinmatishak for talking #5G #IoT & #cybersecurity this week. https://t.co/p734gxe0y4

Today was my last @HouseAppropsGOP @AppropsDems markup & my last as GOP leader of #FSGG subcommittee. This committee is full of congeniality spirited debate & bipartisan friends who aren’t afraid to tell you when you can do better. It's been an honor.  https://t.co/JlnL9bMsJ4

Today @AppropsDems @HouseAppropsGOP approved my work to:  📡Implement natl #5G strategy  📞 Create more secure telecomm networks  💰 Prevent cybercriminals from accessing U.S. financial markets ☁️ Empower fed agencies to use cloud tech  📺💡Set strong standards for #IoT devices

It’s impt that we use every tool in our toolbox to stop hackers & bad actors esp as so much of #US workforce is relying on tech bc of #COVID19.   Thank you to my bipartisan colleagues for working w me to prioritize the safety of the American people online.

My friends @SenDavidPerdue @SenatorSinema & @RepJohnKatko intro'd bills to establish a cybersecurity advisory cmte of local pros cyber experts & state govt officials to consult w/ @CISAGov @DHSGov.   Today @HouseAppropsGOP @AppropsDems approved my effort to establish this cmte.

Today @AppropsDems @HouseAppropsGOP passed language I wrote to crack down on foreign entities & state-owned enterprises that seek to steal data and personal information from #US citizens. We need to be able to trust our networks apps & platforms.    https://t.co/0EfrU3tyEV

#UK #Huawei news is impt bc in the race to 5G we can't sacrifice personal economic & natl security for speed. Today @AppropsDems @HouseAppropsGOP passed language I wrote to implement a secure natl 5G strategy. It's a bipartisan issue that deserves continued attn cc: @AjitPaiFCC
Don't forget - #TaxDay is tomorrow July 15th! https://t.co/IcoCM6J9WG
Smart move by our friends in #UK. Privacy & security should come first. #China #Huawei https://t.co/NHN1thG7VN

I think students should learn computer coding as a 2nd language just as languages like French and Spanish are offered in schools nationwide. Encouraging schools to teach coding could help bridge this gap & help build a cybersecurity workforce for the future.

Learning a traditional foreign language in school is a great skill. But for those students who are attracted to the digital field computer coding should also be an option. It’s a skill that’s deeply needed for so many reasons.

Today @AppropsDems @HouseAppropsGOP passed language I authored to support coding in schools & address our critical cybersecurity workforce shortage. Unless action is taken there will be almost 2 mil unfilled positions in this field by 2022.

Today @AppropsDems @HouseAppropsGOP approved my language to boost #cyberdefense specifically at @StateDept & w @DeptofDefense for our @NATO allies. Thank you Chair @NitaLowey for your kind words supporting these priorities & working w me to boost cyber defense at home & abroad. https://t.co/2VL1Go9x1I
But it’s also important to keep that workforce – and its data – safe from malicious online actors. I'll keep working to keep #US & our data safe. Stay tuned for more.

In my role as Vice Chair of @ModernizeCmte I’ve also come to appreciate the importance of having a forward thinking modern government. This means empowering federal agencies to use cloud technologies. It’s important that our workforce can be accessible anywhere.

It means preventing international cyber criminals from accessing our financial markets and making sure that all of our connected devices meet an industry standard of security before they enter our homes and hook up to our WiFi.
This means building secure networks in order to prevent foreign state-owned enterprises from accessing our data and conducting surveillance of Americans like you and me.

In my last @HouseAppropsGOP @AppropsDems cycle in #congress I'll continue to champion #cyber #telecommunications issues especially as #US workforce is disrupted and displaced as a result of #COVID19. https://t.co/MmCQ0KrAmY

We aren’t finished yet. We have more work to do before the year is over & I can think of no better capstone to my legislative career than to leave Congress in better shape for future #Congress.

When it comes to communicating we recognize the importance of good robust communication with the American people too.  That’s why we recommended increasing opportunities for constituents to communicate with their Representatives and allowing for faster ways to connect.

Even during times of division we have to find a path forward. I have often said that the breakdown in civility & bipartisanship here in #DC is because of the breakdown in relationships.   It’s important that we talk to each other & most importantly – listen to one another.

We found ways to boost civility & bipartisanship in #congress recommending bipartisan retreats & nonpartisan new Member orientation.  At times it felt like we were going against the grain to issue recommendations on this topic but I think that’s why this cmte's work is so impt.

Our first round of recommendations aimed to “open up” Congress. The work we do here in Washington is for our constituents & they should be able to easily access information about votes bills & who is lobbying Congress.  What happens here should be just a click away.

The @ModernizeCmte is one of the most exciting things I've been a part of in #congress. Every rec we make aims to strengthen the House so that we can better serve all Americans.   @RepDerekKilmer & I teamed up to talk @modernizecmte & why this work matters so much. https://t.co/TwwoBpnq7L
